entry.title: Tuesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this evening then clearing. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness early in the afternoon then 30 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023
